name: The day I lost you
description:
A game about rediscovering your memories, taken from you by your illness.
Let your childhood help recollecting your past in the mirrored world.
Use the Mirror to swap between your two selves and try to remember who you are.

Entry for GGJ 2022

Cheap Team

  • Francesco Catalini - Game Design
  •  Andrea Cianfanelli - Programming
  • Manuel Vecchi - Game Design
  • Giulia Vianelli - 3D
